headline: Halliburton secures North Sea well stimulation services deal
summary: The contract is aimed at enhancing well performance and reservoir productivity in the North Sea.

headline: Halliburton: Drilling America's Second Tier Acreage Becomes A Geopolitical Imperative

headline: Cheniere Energy Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Up Y/Y
summary: LNG expects full-year 2025 EBITDA of $6.6 billion to $7 billion and distributable cash flow of $4.4 billion to $4.8 billion.
